errors.title: Error

command.not_owner: Only an owner may run this command.
command.nsfw: This command may only be used in NSFW text channels!
command.guild_only: This command cannot be used in private messages! Use this command in server, where I am.

throttle.command: Too many commands run! Please try again %s.
throttle.pm_user:
Looks like you are using commands a bit too fast, I've banned you from using any commands until you cool down a bit.
Your ban expires %s, keep in mind repeating this behaviour will get you banned for longer periods of time.
throttle.pm_guild:
Looks like people on the server are using commands a bit too fast, I've banned the server from using any commands until everyone clams down a bit.
This ban expires %s, keep in mind repeating this behaviour will get the server banned for longer periods of time.

cooldown.cooldown_button: This action is on cooldown%s! Please try again %s.

embeds.role_value:
ðŸŸ¢ Obtaining a role:
> Click on the button below and select the desired roles. New ticket will be created for your request.

ðŸ”´ Removing a role:
> Click on the button below and select the roles you want to remove.

ðŸ“£ Alerts:
> Click on the buttons below if you want to be notified of events on the server or other.

listener.no_assigned: Can't remove any role that you have.
listener.request_title:
Select roles you want to request.
*Clear selection, if you you selected wrong roles.*
Press 'Other role/-s' if desired role is not present.

When done - press 'Continue'.
listener.request_empty: Can't request any selected role. You may already have those roles.
listener.remove_title:
Select roles you want to remove.
*You will not be able to assign some of the removed roles back.*
listener.remove_failed: Couldn't complete your role removal request. See message bellow.
listener.toggle_failed: Couldn't add/remove requested role. See message bellow and report it to the server Administration.
listener.ticket_exists: You already have an opened ticket, please refer to %s.
listener.cant_create: Failed to crate new ticket. Contact the server Administration.
listener.close_failed: Couldn't close this ticket. Report this to bot developer.
listener.temp_continue: **%s** requested role/-s require duration to be set. Continue?
listener.time_limit: Provided duration must be between 10m <-> 150d or 0 for infinitely.
listener.no_member: User that is requesting roles not found. Maybe, they left this server.
listener.role_failed: I was unable to assign roles to the user.
listener.role_added: Request approved, roles assigned to user.
listener.role_none: There aren't any roles that can be assigned. Manually assign user requested roles.
listener.is_closed: This ticket is already closed. Assign roles manually or press `Close` button.
listener.close_request:
Hey, {user}! support have indicated that the ticket is now resolved. Would you like to close the ticket or do you have further questions? React below accordingly.

If no response {time} the ticket will automatically close itself. To prevent timed close please press cancel.
listener.close_auto:
Hey, {user}! This ticket has not received a response for some time. Do you want to close the ticket or is your request still unresolved? React below accordingly.

If no response {time} the ticket will automatically close itself. To prevent timed close please press cancel.
listener.claimed: The ticket has been successfully claimed by {user}.
listener.unclaimed: The ticket has been successfully un-claimed.
listener.delete_countdown: This ticket will be closed in 5 seconds.

reply_time.help: For how long to wait for user to reply in new ticket. 0 to disable wait / hours

automation.no_options: No tickets settings to be updated.
automation.changed_left: > When ticket's author leaves, ticket will be closed: %s.

delete_pings.name: delete_pings
delete_pings.help: When creating new ticket, delete user/moderator pings?

role_tickets_support.name: role_tickets_support

allow_close.help: Who can close tickets? (Everyone, helper+ or support)

transcripts_mode.help: For which tickets transcript will be created? (All, except roles or none)

settings.bad_roles: No roles provided (use @Role) or more than 3.

add.help: Add role/-s to the specified user

**Modify %s roles.**
Add or remove roles below, then press the button to confirm changes.

user.name: user
user.help: Select user to which assign this role

duration.name: duration
duration.help: For how long to assign this role (Example: 2h, 2w5d (w-week, d-day, h-hour))

delete.name: delete
delete.help: Delete this role, after time has passed? (default-false)

assign.not_whitelisted: Selected role is not whitelisted! Ask Administrator to add it to the list.
assign.incorrect_user: Selected member can't be assigned role.

cancel.not_found: Selected role is not assigned temporary to this user.

extend.help: Extend temporary role time for user

duration.name: duration
duration.help: For how long to extend this role (Example: 2h, 2w5d (w-week, d-day, h-hour))
